sentences.cn: …一个镶嵌着小三角形的盒子。

sentences.en: At the middle of the room, there was an inlaid table.
sentences.cn: 在房间的正中间放着一张有嵌花装饰的桌子.

sentences.en: He bought a table in which he inlaid design himself.
sentences.cn: 他买了一张桌子,自己在上面镶嵌上图案.

sentences.en: It is a diamond one inlaid with 18 K gold.
sentences.cn: 这是一枚镶有18K金的钻石戒指.

sentences.en: It's handmade and the inlaid designs are etched in.
sentences.cn: 它完全手工制造,而且雕刻部分设计是采用蚀镂法刻入.

sentences.en: The bearing strength of DF - 5 AS bimetal inlaid self - lubricating slide.
sentences.cn: DF-5AS双金属镶嵌自润滑滑块的承载能力.

sentences.en: The box was inlaid with gold monograms.
sentences.cn: 这箱子镶嵌着金质字母.

sentences.en: The dogwood bud, pale green is inlaid with russet markings.
sentences.cn: 山茱萸的蓓蕾, 淡绿清雅,点缀着褐色斑痕.

sentences.en: The heavy dark table is inlaid with lighter wood.
sentences.cn: 笨重的深色桌子上嵌有颜色较浅的木头。

sentences.en: The lid of the box had been inlaid with silver.
The terminal is compounding type with inlaid lead copper core.
sentences.cn: 终端是内置铅铜核心的复合型材料.

sentences.en: The walls and the floor were inlaid with sparkling jewels.
sentences.cn: 墙壁和地板上都镶着发光的宝石.

sentences.en: The white marble floors were inlaid in a radial pattern of brass.
sentences.cn: 白色的大理石地板镶嵌在铜质的放射形图案中。

sentences.en: Theterminal is compounding type with inlaid lead copper core.
sentences.cn: 终端为复合型的,带内置铅铜芯线.

sentences.en: This wall painting inlaid with gold and jade is very splendid.
sentences.cn: 这张壁画,金镶玉嵌,十分华丽.

trans.tran_en: an inlaid box, table, floor etc has little pieces of another material set into its surface for decoration

trans.tran_cn: 把…嵌入，把…镶入( inlay的过去式和过去分词 )，镶饰（物品）
